subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez was finally ready to play Saturday after missing two games for a sore knee, and drove in a run, but he stranded four runners in his next three at-bats.
snippet: Manny Ramírez was finally ready to play Saturday after missing two games for a sore knee, and drove in a run, but he stranded four runners in his next three at-bats.
